body_html:
The current doc of Installing TensorFlow on Mac OS X, see:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac
does mention that:

Important: Docker currently does not support TensorFlow with GPU support on Mac OS; that is, on Mac OS, Docker only supports TensorFlow with CPU support.

I think this issue has already been addressed?
body_text:
The current doc of Installing TensorFlow on Mac OS X, see:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac
does mention that:
Important: Docker currently does not support TensorFlow with GPU support on Mac OS; that is, on Mac OS, Docker only supports TensorFlow with CPU support.

I think this issue has already been addressed?
body:
The current doc of `Installing TensorFlow on Mac OS X`, see:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac
does mention that:
```
Important: Docker currently does not support TensorFlow with GPU support on Mac OS; that is, on Mac OS, Docker only supports TensorFlow with CPU support.
```

I think this issue has already been addressed?
